title: Tried Green Tomatoes
description:
This week, Tried Green Tomatoes. Michael files suit against his friend and neighbor Sam. Michael is growing tomatoes on their shared rooftop and wants Sam to go onto the roof to admire his plants. Sam thinks he should never have to set foot on the roof.

Who’s right? Who’s wrong? Only one can decide!

Thank you to Daniel Herrera for naming this week’s case! To suggest a title for a future episode, follow Judge John Hodgman on Facebook. We regularly put out a call for submissions.

—

SUBSCRIBE TO THIS PODCAST in APPLE PODCASTS or the RSS FEED
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
